nodes.display_name: Cosmic XR - Space In Your Room
nodes.short_description: Explore space and the universe right from your room. Touch, rotate, and scale planets, moons, and other celestial objects with your hands. Cradle Earth, glide through the Milky Way, and gaze at Andromeda. Dive into black holes and experience the solar system in stunning detail — with the freedom to grab and manipulate. With passthrough and natural hand interaction, the cosmos is now within your reach. The universe is no longer out there. It’s right here — in your hands.

방 안에서 우주를 탐험하세요. 행성, 달, 그리고 천체들을 손으로 직접 만지고, 지구본을 다루듯이 회전시키고, 양손으로 크기를 조절하며 자세히 관찰 할 수 있습니다. 지구를 품은 은하수와 우리의 이웃 안드로메다를 살펴보세요. 은하수의 중심 사수자리의 블랙홀을 관찰하고, 태양계를 놀라운 디테일로 체험하세요. 패스스루와 자연스러운 핸드트래킹 인터랙션을 통해 이제 우주는 바로 여기, 당신의 손 안에 있습니다.

nodes.display_name: Cosmic XR - Univers dans votre chambre
nodes.short_description: Explorez l'univers directement depuis votre chambre. Touchez, faites pivoter et redimensionnez les planètes, les lunes et autres objets célestes avec vos mains. Bercez la Terre, glissez à travers la Voie lactée et contemplez Andromède. Plongez dans les trous noirs et découvrez le système solaire dans des détails époustouflants — avec la liberté de saisir et de manipuler. Avec la technologie passthrough et l'interaction naturelle des mains, le cosmos est désormais à votre portée. L'univers n'est plus là dehors. Il est ici — entre vos mains.

nodes.display_name: Cosmic XR - Universum in deinem Zimmer
nodes.short_description: Erkunde das Universum direkt von deinem Zimmer aus. Berühre, drehe und skaliere Planeten, Monde und andere Himmelskörper mit deinen Händen. Halte die Erde, gleite durch die Milchstraße und blicke auf Andromeda. Tauche in Schwarze Löcher ein und erlebe das Sonnensystem in atemberaubenden Details — mit der Freiheit, zu greifen und zu manipulieren. Mit Passthrough und natürlicher Handinteraktion ist der Kosmos jetzt in deiner Reichweite. Das Universum ist nicht mehr da draußen. Es ist hier — in deinen Händen.

部屋から宇宙を探検しましょう。 手で惑星、月、その他の天体に触れ、回転させ、拡大縮小してください。地球を抱き、銀河系を滑るように進み、アンドロメダを眺めましょう。ブラックホールに飛び込み、太陽系を驚くほどの詳細で体験してください — つかんで操作する自由とともに。 パススルーと自然な手の動きによるインタラクションで、宇宙は今あなたの手に届きます。 宇宙はもう遠くにありません。ここ、すぐあなたの手にあります。

node.display_name: Cosmic XR - Space In Your Room

nodes.long_description:
Welcome to Cosmic XR — your personal gateway to the universe, right in your room.

With passthrough enabled on Meta Quest, your real-world space becomes the stage for an epic cosmic journey. Watch your surroundings transform into a living, interactive map of the universe.

Reach out with your hands to touch, rotate, and scale beautifully detailed planets. Cradle Earth, spin Saturn’s rings, or feel the storms swirl across Jupiter. Every celestial object responds naturally to your gestures with lifelike motion and scale.

It’s not just planets — explore their moons too. Glide over Ganymede’s icy crust, study Callisto’s craters, or float through Titan’s thick atmosphere. Each moon is fully interactive and rich in detail.

Explore from the largest structure — the cosmic web — to billions of sprinkled galaxies, to our Milky Way and Solar System, down to the Galactic Center and its mysterious black hole.

Drift along the filaments of dark matter, hover above the spiral arms of the Milky Way, and gaze at our neighbor, the majestic Andromeda Galaxy. Dive into the warped light of a black hole and witness space and time bend before you.

Whether you're a lifelong stargazer or simply curious about the cosmos, Cosmic XR brings the universe into your space — to observe, interact, and wonder.

The universe is now in your hands.
nodes.short_description: Explore the universe right in your room. Touch, rotate, and scale planets, moons, and other celestial objects with your hands. Cradle Earth, glide through the Milky Way and gaze at Andromeda. Interact with the cosmic web, dive into black holes, and experience the solar system in stunning detail with the freedom to grab and manipulate. With passthrough and natural hand interaction, the cosmos is now within your reach. The universe is no longer out there. It’s right here — in your hands.

nodes.change_log: Fixed Solar System rendering issue on the devices with Fixed Foveated Rendering turned on with other performance optimization apps.
Now you can turn off text using the main menu's toggle button when you want to experience a text-free experience.
